GSD.description: In SilverStripe through 4.5.0, a specific URL path configured by default through the silverstripe/framework module can be used to disclose the fact that a domain is hosting a Silverstripe application. There is no disclosure of the specific version. The functionality on this URL path is limited to execution in a CLI context, and is not known to present a vulnerability through web-based access. As a side-effect, this preconfigured path also blocks the creation of other resources on this path (e.g. a page).

advisories.solution: Unfortunately, there is no solution available yet.
advisories.title: Silverstripe CMS information disclosure

advisories.affected_versions: All versions starting from 4.0.0 up to 4.4.7, all versions starting from 4.5.0 before 4.5.4

advisories.not_impacted: All versions before 4.0.0, all versions after 4.4.7 before 4.5.0, all versions starting from 4.5.4
advisories.title: Information Exposure
